COMMENT_TX: $Ozzie Smith deflected the ball toward the LF line
$Mark Petkovsek maked a good play but Luis Alicea was late covering 1B; Alicea and Chipper Jones collided, the ball got loose and Mark Lemke went to 3B
$Mark Lemke playing to SS side of 2B
$Mark Lemke out on appeal for leaving 3B too soon
$Ozzie Smith's last major league at bat; he received a long ovation from the crowd
